sub_fields.label: Height
sub_fields.name: height_px
sub_fields.instructions: Make sure to include the proper units.

sub_fields.label: Section Overlap
sub_fields.name: section_overlap
sub_fields.instructions: Applies a negative top margin to this section, causing it to overlap the preceding section.

sub_fields.label: Angle
sub_fields.name: angle
sub_fields.instructions: Defines the direction of the gradient overlay.

sub_fields.label: Vertically Center Column Content
sub_fields.name: content_column_valign
sub_fields.instructions: Attempt to vertically center all columns within the container. May have unintended side effects with certain layouts.

sub_fields.label: Horizontally Center Column Content
sub_fields.name: content_column_halign
sub_fields.instructions: Attempt to horizontally center all columns within the container. May have unintended side effects with certain layouts.
